1279360.name: The Amazing Ball
1279360.description:
Roll, Jump, Avoid! The Amazing Ball is a game where you are a ball and you must complete the mazes and avoid all the obstacles at all costs.

Key Features:
  • 50 Mazes to Explore and Complete
  • Challenge Mode
  • Unique Balls That Each Have Their Own Unique Abilities
  • Multipule Varients of the Spiky Ball
  • Many Different Types of Obstacles
  • DirectX Ray-Tracing for Realistic Shadows and Reflections
1279360.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
